Authors:
Sirinapa Konta, Sajeewa S.N. Maharachchikumbura, Indunil
Chinthani Senanayake, Eric H.C. McKenzie, Marc Stadler, Saranyaphat
Boonmee, Rungtiwa Phookamsak, Ruvishika Shehali Jayawardena, Kevin D
Hyde, Prapassorn Damrongkool Eungwanichayapant
Title:
A new genus Allodiatrype, three new species and a new host
record of diatrypaceous fungi from palms (Arecaceae) in Thailand
Keywords:
1 new genus - 3 new species  Diatrypaceae  morphology 
palm fungi  phylogeny  Thai fungi  Xylariales
Abstract:
Diatrypaceous fungi on palms (Arecaceae) in Thailand were
collected and identified based on morphological as well as combined
sequence analyses (ITS and β-tubulin). One new genus Allodiatrype ,
three new species, Allocryptovalsa elaeidis, Allodiatrype arengae, and
Diatrypella elaeidis are introduced. A checklist of Diatrypaceae
occurring on palms (Arecaceae) and Thai diatrypaceous fungi is also
provided.
